name: H&K HK416 LoRA
description:
This LoRA can make a gun more like the H&K HK416 rifle

When I used tags like "gun", "weapons", complex combinations of weapons often appear in the picture. So I make this LoRA to let the AI know what the HK416 is.

The appearance seems to be particularly accurate in the side view, not so perfect but still good than before.

Use tags like "holding weapon, assault rifle, aiming at viewer" will make character pose better.

Hope you use this LoRA to create more beautiful works.

Thanks!

再也不用看未来多枪管组合超级武器了，还是LoRA好，能单独炼枪，先试了下HK416，效果还不错，就是有点角度限定，多枪管等邪典情况还是会有，但是比以前稳定太多了，大家来试试吧23333
